name: bingo Pou Poo Pro
description:
"Who would have thought bingo could be addicting? Love the pace of the game it keeps you on your toes."
"Incredibly addictive!"
"Polished, fast-paced, nugget-y fun. Great ramp-up."
Features:
-New Bingo modes!
-New Islands to explore!
• Simple and easy to play!
• Complete with high scores and leader board
• Rich high quality interface & fast game play!
• Real sound effects
• Device Sync gameplay with Facebook.
